status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dcj9u","text":"Request cells from RICS on or before 9am on the day of planned thaw","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ikqj","text":"Confirm items are in the hood pre-thaw:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e5bp","text":"Warm media","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ef2ra","text":"15ml centrifuge tube","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61lqb","text":"1ml pipette \u0026 tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a2pi","text":"Waste bin","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c80j6","text":"Aspiration pipettes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jrqd","text":"Motorised pipette controller","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7jhu","text":"Pre-warm media (and reagents to make complete media) +/- trypsin in   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7aa9i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bkc85","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B6927BD71E4B11ECB7470A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"water bath","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8mvlo","text":"Use weights to ensure media bottles do not tip over and for the mouth of the bottle to contact water!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f1rai","text":"Prepare covered bucket of dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2opks","text":"Retrieve vials of frozen cells from -80C freezer and place into dry ice bucket and cover","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ceb85","text":"Thaw vial in   , observing closely until only a small crystal is left, then transfer to hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c8oo3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"6D9EE6B01E5011EC90AC11060E88D07A","id":0,"label":"water bath","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vgml","text":"While reagents are warming up:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"332s9","text":"Wipe down microscope table using paper towels and 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddfiv","text":"Wipe down microscope stage using Kimwipes and 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dgb1","text":"View cells under microscope","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nas3","text":"Switch on biosafety cabinet, wipe down using paper towels and 1% Chemgene, then with 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ijvl","text":"Fill a 1L plastic beaker with ~100-200ml 2% Virkon","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"125je","text":"Add a tablet of Virkon into a aspirator collection bottle and fill with 250-500ml tap water, then fit into vacuum aspirator and turn on system","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dedlh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21o40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1okic","text":"When viewing cells under microscope, record confluence and presence of floating cells, dying cells \u0026 debris","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lqre","text":"Any time before placing into the hood:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arkvb","text":"Pipettes: Wipe down using paper towels and 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b403","text":"All racks and containers (of liquids, pipette tips, etc but not cells): Spray down with 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7n95","text":"All items in water bath: Wipe down using paper towels and 70% ethanol, then spray down with 70% ethanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6fa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sn1e","text":"Spray hands with 70% ethanol frequently","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55c7i","text":"Using 1ml pipette, transfer contents of vial into a 15ml centrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u7or","text":"Add   dropwise","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2cjs0","text":"Gently mix by inversion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iv5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hjri","text":"Pelleting:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a2gd","text":"Centrifuge at    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bq1ij","text":"Aspirate supernatant using aspiration pipette connected to vacuum aspirator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"9","error":false,"guid":"A6E9E2601E5211EC90AC11060E88D07A","id":0,"label":"media","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"74C51F701E5211EC90AC11060E88D07A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9661h","text":"Flick pellet to loosen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coiue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j011","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8b1j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ts8l","text":"During centrifugation, transfer cell culture flasks to be used to the hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19cct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rbbd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1efd8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jfbt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cofip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2e6rf","text":"If doubling time or recommended seeding density of cells unknown, and cells \u003c= 3x10E6: thaw into 1x T25; if \u003e= 3x10E6 cells thaw into 1x T75","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aiuaa","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"39be6","text":"Seeding densities vary based on cell size and doubling time, seeding densities seen on cell culture reference charts often may not work for slowly dividing or small cells","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23a94","text":"Using alcohol-resistant markers, label with cell line name, passage number, date \u0026 initials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"392m7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ad9ni","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"pu0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"av6gr","text":"Passage numbers: if thawed from a vial frozen by someone else: can continue numbering or append numbers (i.e. pXX+1)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8b793","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elu6b","text":"Each transfer to a new cell culture surface constitutes a passage, including after a thaw. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"en01l","text":"Freezing into a vial does not count as a passage","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vdk4","text":"Wash cells wiith PBS 1-2 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea7tq","text":"Add the appropriate volume of trypsin for the flasks used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83esq","text":"Tilt plates to ensure trypsin evenly coats all cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adv63","text":"Incubate in   for up to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"34d7l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"agtl1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgd7v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"62207BDD1F8511ECB7470A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"incubator (5% CO2, humidified)","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"9DFA49E01F8511ECAB56B9A77B827BE5","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":34,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"8i3al","text":"Work with up to 4 flasks at a time","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"435ou","text":"Wipe down flasks containing cells with 70% ethanol before handling, at least once per week","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dck8h","text":"1-2 days later, Check on cells to assess recovery/attachment and change media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"chfl","text":"Once the vast majority of cells have detached, inactivate trypsin w/ media, using at least double the volume of trypsin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rntl","text":"Pellet cells:   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"200","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"19541EBE1F8711ECB7470A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4187o","text":"Check under microscope whether cells have detached 3, 5, 8 \u0026 10 minutes after placing into incubator, particularly the edges.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6hs","text":"Tapping the sides of the flask may help to detach cells but also cause clumping.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mvsm","text":"Inspect cells under the microscope .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2erug","text":"Cells are best trypsinised while in the exponential phase of growth, generally between 40-90% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cdt1","text":"Usually, cells are trypsinised near the end of the exponential growth phase, at 70-90% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u1mv","text":"Cells may also be subcultured to remove debris not detached during media changes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9ldt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mfq2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8b9hm","text":"Some cell lines grow in multilayered clusters (i.e. HCC1500) and never reach high confluence","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
